title: Outgoing Payment
description: An **outgoing payment** resource represents a payment that will be, is currently being, or has previously been, sent from the wallet address.

walletAddress.description: The URL of the wallet address from which this payment is sent.

accessToken.description: The access token required to access the resource. This token is provided when a grant is created.

id.description: The URL identifying the outgoing payment.

quoteId.description: The URL of the quote defining this payment's amounts.

failed.description: Describes whether the payment failed to send its full amount.

receiver.description: The URL of the incoming payment that is being paid.
receiver.title: Receiver

receiveAmount.description: The total amount that should be received by the receiver when this outgoing payment has been paid.
receiveAmount.title: amount

value.description: The value is an unsigned 64-bit integer amount, represented as a string.

assetCode.title: Asset code
assetCode.description: The assetCode is a code that indicates the underlying asset. An ISO4217 currency code should be used whenever possible. The ISO4217 representation of the US Dollar is USD.

assetScale.title: Asset scale
assetScale.description: The number of decimal places that defines the scale of the smallest divisible unit for the given asset code. It determines how an integer amount is scaled to derive the actual monetary value. For example, USD has an asset scale of 2 with the smallest unit being 0.01. An integer amount of `1000` with an `assetCode` of `USD` and `assetScale` of `2` translates to $10.00.

debitAmount.description: The total amount that should be deducted from the sender's account when this outgoing payment has been paid.
